item.title: US Osprey makes emergency landing in Japan, officials say
item.description: The U.S. Air Force said the craft made a "precautionary landing."

item.title: Israel reviewing Hamas response to ceasefire proposal
item.description: Hamas announced Wednesday night it had submitted to mediators a response to the ceasefire deal currently on the table.

item.title: Here's what prosecutors said about Ghislaine Maxwell 3 years ago
item.description: Ghislaine Maxwell engaged in a "significant pattern of dishonest conduct," federal prosecutors said in a 2022 sentencing memo.

item.title: WATCH: William McNeil speaks out after video of violent arrest sparks probe
item.description: William McNeil, Jr., whose violent arrest by deputies in Jacksonville, Florida, sheriff's has gone viral, tells ABC News' Linsey Davis what was going ...

item.title: WATCH: Costumed man pursued in Japanese bear drill
item.description: Following the recent attacks across Japan, the police and a hunt club conducted a bear drill, featuring a man in a costume playing the bear.
